user_query: I'm looking for a theater near Los Angeles that offers reserved seating and online ticketing. Can you provide a list of such theaters? Also, I would like to know the opening movies in the USA. Lastly, fetch the latest global recession news articles for me.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of theaters in Los Angeles that offer reserved seating and online ticketing.
Retrieve the list of currently opening movies in the USA.
Search for the latest news articles regarding global recession.
